title: Callaway Men's Pro Spin Fine Line Short Sleeve Golf Polo, Stretch, Moisture-Wicking, Sun Protection (Available in Big & Tall)
description: MOISTURE WICKING: Opti-Dri moisture-wicking technology built into this men's golf shirt pulls sweat away from the body for on-course comfort that lasts.
SUN PROTECTION: Built-in sun protection prevents harmful UV rays from penetrating the fabric of the golf top, helping to protect covered skin on sunny days spent outdoors.
STRETCH: This comfortable golf polo is crafted from lightweight, stretch fabric that allows you to maximize your range of motion. Drive the ball down the fairway or putt for par without restriction.
JERSEY FABRICATION: This versatile solid polo shirt is crafted with soft jersey fabrication for lightweight and breathable all-day comfort on or off the course.

CLASSIC FIT: This short sleeve golf shirt comes in a lightweight and flexible fabric with a solid self collar. It has a roomy engineered fit for a better range of motion. The polo shirt is available in Regular and Big & Tall sizes.
EXTENDED SIZES: This golf shirt is available in big and tall sizes to provide comfortable coverage and a full range of motion.

This Callaway men's golf polo It's crafted from lightweight stretch fabric for full range of motion from tee to green. Moisture-wicking technology keeps you cool and dry, and UPF 50 safeguards your skin from the sun's harmful UV rays. Fine line stripes bring fashionable flair to the comfortable short sleeve polo.
